# Crypto-DES-Assignment
DES Encryption and Decryption java program

## Working
This program take PT & Key as input of 16 hexadecimal characters and then convert it to binary to perform all operations. At the end final encrypted text is converted again to hexadecimal format.

 ## Sample Input
PT = 123abc456def7890<br />
Key = 3b3898371520f75e<br />

### Sample Run ###
Enter the input as a 16 character hexadecimal value:<br />
123abc456def7890<br />
PT = 0001001000111010101111000100010101101101111011110111100010010000<br />

Enter the key as a 16 character hexadecimal value:<br />
3b3898371520f75e<br />
Key = 0011101100111000100110000011011100010101001000001111011101011110<br />

+++ ENCRYPTION +++<br />
IP = 0111100011000111001111000011100010100100011101100111011000100011<br />
PC1 = 01000100110000000110101111011100100111011000100001111111<br />
Left 32 bits of IP =  = 01111000110001110011110000111000<br />
Right 32 bits of IP =  = 10100100011101100111011000100011<br />
